title: Seminar in Networks and Security
ziele: Students should elaborate on a scientific topic from the area of Networks and Security by doing an independent literature survey. They should present their topic in a talk as well as in a written seminar thesis.
beurteilung: Correctness, completeness and clarity of the presentation and the seminar thesis.
methoden: Independent literature survey; submission of a written seminar thesis; presentation of the chosen seminar topic in a talk to other students.
literatur: Basic literature is provided by the course instructor, but students should also do an independent literature survey.
equivalent: <sup><acronym title='Unfortunately this information is not available in english.'>(*)</acronym></sup>INMNWSENESI: SE Seminar aus Netzwerke und Sicherheit (3 ECTS)
